about.title: About us
about.description: We take over the entire online cycle: from site prototype and development to advertising, tracking and analytics. We speak simply, work quickly and transparently: the goal is real leads and sales, not "checkmarks" in reports. You give the task — we assemble an understandable system from the site, advertising and data.
